t: TIL Amazon used to manufacture "dash buttons" where if you press the button (which can be mounted anywhere) the product the button is linked to is automatically ordered

s: June 28, 2024 - On June 15, 2017, a new version of the scanner was announced by Amazon. The new version has Alexa built in, allowing users to ask for recipes and order from Amazon Prime Now. The Dash Button and Dash Replenishment Service (DRS) were introduced by Amazon.com on March 31, 2015.

t: The Horror of Amazon’s New Dash Button | The New Yorker
s: April 2, 2015 - Shopping should make you feel bad, if only for a second. Pressing a little plastic button is too much fun.

t: Amazon Dash Button Teardown | Matthew Petroff
s: July 13, 2016 - Opening the case reveals a small printed circuit board with an Energizer Ultimate Lithium AAA battery. t: I will miss Amazon’s Dash buttons | The Verge
s: August 2, 2019 - Amazon is killing off its Dash buttons. The tiny stick-on buttons could be used to reorder common household goods, but not enough people have been using them. Amazon is now disabling them at the end of August
